tool.name: GdalExtractProfile
tool.description: Extract elevation values along a line.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGeometry False output_data_Profile $output_data_Profile name GdalExtractProfile RasterFile '$RasterFile' Geometry $Geometry prefer $prefer response $response outputType_Profile $OutputSection_Profile.outputType_Profile transmissionMode_Profile $OutputSection_Profile.transmissionMode_Profile

param.name: RasterFile
param.label: The name of the MNT file
param.help: The file containing elevation model relative to the dataPath defined in the ZOO-Project main configuration file.

param.name: Geometry
param.label: The path to calaculate profile
param.help: The input data source name to use as source for convertion. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_Profile
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_Profile
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Fetch the x,y,z values of a DEM raster file along a linestring
